params.name: scale
params.description: The scale to use for rescaling the image.

params.name: data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format of the image. If not provided, it will be the same as the input image.

params.name: dtype
params.description: The dtype of the output image. Defaults to np.float32. Used for backwards compatibility with featureextractors.

params.name: input_data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format of the input image. If not provided, it will be inferred from the input image.
